message.content:
cs.DL, cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.CY, cs.CR

The paper discusses a new class of research evaluation metrics that use full-text to assess the value of a publication. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Digital Libraries (cs.DL) sub-category, which deals with the organization, retrieval, and distribution of digital information. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of semantic similarity to estimate research contribution, which is a common topic in Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Computational Linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also discusses the evaluation of research performance, which could fall under the sub-categories of Cybersecurity (cs.CY) and Cryptography (cs.CR).
